title: Canon image PROGRAF iPF 671 (On Order)
summary: Get more vibrant colours on CAD and GIS drawings and better quality red text with the new magenta ink which covers a broader spectrum than ever.Support high volume continuous printing and achieve higher productivity with the hot swap ink tanks which can be replaced while printing.Boost productivity and streamline printing workflows with imagePROGRAF Direct Print & Share which lets you print a host of file types without an application.5-colour Dye & Pigment ink systemPrint size: 24" (A1+)High speed and quality Auto CAD and GIS printing130 ml Ink cartridges90ml*6 free starter ink setHeavy duty print head with 15360 nozzles1 year on site comprehensive warranty
